title: Magazine Fonts
content:
I’m now embarking on my final major project at university and thought i would post a topic on here about great magazine fonts. I will leave the topic pretty open to talk about and let’s see what comes from it, so people could suggest individual fonts, magazine history, certain typographers, front cover fonts, anything to do with magazines. this will be a big help for my research so....cheers.

 [‹ Freight Micro for headlines](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905132430/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42241 "Go to previous forum topic") [Optical margin alignment ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905132430/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42153 "Go to next forum topic")
author: golpys

comments.content: I guess you could write a whole report on the use of Bodoni in logotypes for women- and fashion mags... ;)
